title: Essential Oil of the Month | Chiropractor in Franklin, WI | Sweet Family Chiropractic
description: Essential Oil of the Month in Franklin, WI. Sweet Family Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Franklin serving all of your needs. Call us today at (414) 855-3870 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Oil of the Month: ~ OnGuard~ Common uses: Primary uses are for antibacterial, antifungal, colds, cough, flu, and infection. Application methods: Topically- Apply to navel, bottoms of the feet, or rub on the throat area, diluted. Aromatically- Diffuse or inhale aroma directly. Body systems affected: Oils in this blend are effective for dealing with various problems related to the immune system. Aromatic influence: OnGuard is perfect for protecting the body against colds, flus, and other viruses. Blend contains: wild orange, clove, cinnamon bark, eucalyptus radiata, and rosemary.
